org.eclipse.californium.core.network

Interface Endpoint

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CoapEndpoint

    public interface Endpoint
    A communication endpoint multiplexing CoAP message exchanges between (potentially multiple) clients and servers. An Endpoint is bound to a particular IP address and port. Clients use an Endpoint to send a request to a server. Servers bind resources to one or more Endpoints in order for them to be requested over the network by clients.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        void start()
           throws IOException
        Start this endpoint and all its components.. The starts its connector. If no executor has been set yet, the endpoint uses a single-threaded executor.
        Throws:
        IOException - if the endpoint could not be started, e.g. because the endpoint's port is already in use.

      • stop

        void stop()
        Stop this endpoint and all its components, e.g., the connector. A stopped endpoint can be started again.

      • destroy

        void destroy()
        Destroys this endpoint and all its components. A destroyed endpoint cannot be started again.

      • clear

        void clear()
        Clears this endpoint's internal registries for tracking message exchanges.

        Needed for tests to remove duplicates.

      • isStarted

        boolean isStarted()
        Checks if this endpoint has started.
        Returns:
        true if this endpoint is running.

      • setExecutor

        void setExecutor(ScheduledExecutorService executor)
        Sets the executor for this endpoint and all its components.
        Parameters:
        executor - the new executor

      • addObserver

        void addObserver(EndpointObserver obs)
        Adds the observer to the list of observers. This has nothing to do with CoAP observe relations.
        Parameters:
        obs - the observer

      • removeObserver

        void removeObserver(EndpointObserver obs)
        Removes the endpoint observer.This has nothing to do with CoAP observe relations.
        Parameters:
        obs - the observer

      • addNotificationListener

        void addNotificationListener(NotificationListener lis)
        Adds a listener for observe notification (This is related to CoAP observe)
        Parameters:

        void removeNotificationListener(NotificationListener lis)
        Removes a listener for observe notification (This is related to CoAP observe)
        Parameters:

      • getAddress

        InetSocketAddress getAddress()
        Gets the address this endpoint is associated with.
        Returns:
        the address

      • getUri

        URI getUri()
        Gets the URI for accessing this endpoint.

        The URI will be built using this endpoint's supported scheme (e.g. coap or coaps) and the host name or IP address and port this endpoint is bound to.

        Returns:
        The URI.

      • getConfig

        NetworkConfig getConfig()
        Gets this endpoint's configuration.
        Returns:
        the configuration

      • cancelObservation

        void cancelObservation(Token token)
        Cancel observation for this request.
        Parameters:
        token - the token of the original request which establishes the observe relation to cancel.
